snippet.title: Kagami: An Odyssey in Japanese Language Learning 2024 Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
こんにちは! This is the trailer for our Japanese introductory Language Learning game, which will be coming out on steam in early access very soon (Hopefully January 2024 in fact!)

Here is the link to the Steam Page if your interested!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2340320/Kagami_An_Odyssey_in_Japanese_Language_Learning/

Thank you! ありがとう ございます!

#gamedev #japanese #indiegame #indiedev
